#summary The Future of Security Onion
Please note that this is all subject to change!
  * March 2012
    * Break monolithic Snorby package into separate packages and deploy latest Snorby
    * Snort 2.9.2.1
    * Issue 226 - Rename Bro workers - http://code.google.com/p/security-onion/issues/detail?id=226
    * Issue 219 - Default web page - http://code.google.com/p/security-onion/issues/detail?id=219
  * April 2012
    * Issue 146 - ELSA (web-based interface for logs) - http://code.google.com/p/security-onion/issues/detail?id=146
    * Issue 205 - Remove httpry and httpry_agent in favor of Bro's http logging searchable with ELSA - http://code.google.com/p/security-onion/issues/detail?id=205
  * May/June/July 2012 - Big Distro Rebuild (BDR)
    * Lubuntu 12.04
    * 64-bit
    * Launchpad PPA so that all updates (Ubuntu and Security Onion) are done via apt-get
    * Considering pfring for higher performance
    * Development on the existing 32-bit version of Security Onion will stop so that we can focus on the future
